A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Speaking as a life-long Star Wars fan (I watched A New Hope in 1977 as a 6-year-old)\, I don’t understand what everyone is so upset about. This was a fun movie. Entertaining\, original\, and unexpected. No\, it didn’t answer every question I had\, and yes\, I have a few complaints. But\, you know what? If they let me write the script\, everyone would still complain. I loved seeing some of my favorite characters\, and I was thrilled to share Star Wars with my son\, who is now 12. He loved it. Let’s just enjoy this one for what it is\, a thrilling movie with a good story and exciting plot turns. Maybe you need to ask yourself\, “Are my expectations too high?” Lighten up\, don’t think so hard\, and have some fun like that 6-year-old did back in ‘77.
